subject: gearbox H 7+R support
description_text:
This morning when i started my computer to play est 2 my gearbox did not
receive any signal and i checked with the software all the buttons
disappeared in the test section. i think there is some bug related to the
programming or software of the gearbox that made the code disappear, i hope
your side will help me fix it. thank you[image: Chưa có tên.png]
 [sorry my english is quite bad and i used part of google translate]

conversations.body_text: Hi Piyon 2. 0,     You can use VKB Joy Tester for testing, as the built-in Windows testing tool can sometimes be unstable.        https://www.vkbcontrollers.com/pages/downloads
